definition: Matsu, name of a sea goddess still widely worshipped on the SE China coast and in SE Asia

sentences.english: Secondly, Fujian Department of Matsu is one of God.
sentences.chinese: 其次，媽祖是閩系人的神。

sentences.english: Mazu belief has spread overseas with overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 媽祖信仰也隨華僑傳至海外。

sentences.english: It is well-known that in the formation of Mazu belief the influences from Buddhism and Daoism play an important role.
sentences.chinese: 媽祖信仰的形成，與佛道二教影響分不開。

sentences.english: The locals had no choice but to agree. Mastu's home locates in the ferry terminal area of Meizhou Island.
sentences.chinese: 媽祖的老家就在現在湄洲島的輪渡碼頭一帶。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, why was Ma Zu who was a common folk fisherwoman divinized as a goddess?
sentences.chinese: 但是媽祖這個民間漁女，爲何被奉爲天后聖母？

sentences.english: The localization of Mazu belief was supported by Fujianese.
sentences.chinese: 如今附祀它廟的媽祖只是一種程式化供奉。

sentences.english: As the ancestral temple, every day a quantity of believers come there.
sentences.chinese: 作爲祖廟，每天來此朝拜媽祖的香客非常多。

sentences.english: On the front, the coin will feature the Statue of A-Ma which stands on Coloane Peak.
sentences.chinese: 紀念幣的面是矗立在澳門路環山頂的媽祖雕像。

sentences.english: I come from Putian, Ma Zu's hometown, beautiful and ancient city.
sentences.chinese: 我來自莆田，媽祖的故鄉，一個美麗而又古老的城市。

sentences.english: There is an old origin between Ma-Zu belief and Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 媽祖信仰與中國古代傳統文化有着很深的淵源。

sentences.english: To show their respect for Mazu.
sentences.chinese: 那爲了表示對媽祖的尊敬。

sentences.english: The essay aims to tackle the inner mechanism of Xu's novels from the point view of folklore.
sentences.chinese: 本文從民俗學角度闡釋媽祖文化對許地山創作的影響。

sentences.english: It is said Mazu was a Longnv (dragon maid) along with the Guanyin.
sentences.chinese: 傳說媽祖原是觀世音身邊的一個龍女。

sentences.english: Therefore around the island, you may often find a festival to celebrate her.
sentences.chinese: 因此你在全島各地都可能會碰到慶祝媽祖的慶典。

sentences.english: But Matsu is the emergence line with the law.
sentences.chinese: 但是媽祖的出現是符合規律的。

sentences.english: The lamps of two sides are Brilliance Lamps.

definition: Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
to burn incense at a temple
Lord Guan (i.e. 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3])
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
the Three Precious Treasures of Buddhism, namely: the Buddha 佛, the Dharma 法 (his teaching), and the Sangha 僧 (his monastic order)
